name: Yama - Yet Another Metroidvania Attempt
description:
This is the release 0.1 of my game.

It is the game from he GamedevTV Complete C# 2D Unity Game Development course with Rick Davidson. It is currently very simple with only 3 levels.

I would  like to thank the awesome team at GamedevTV for the courses and sharing their love of developing games to everyone. I would also like to thank Foxfin for their Super Platformer Asset Pack on steam. It was the best money I have spent of late. Check Foxfins work out, it is awesome. Also check out GamedevTV if you want to learn more about game development!

This is certainly a work in progress and I intend to improve the game fairly frequently. Please let me know what you would like to see in the comments, and any issues you may have.
